item.title: Live Updates: Swiss Authorities Say Sparklers Probably Caused New Year’s Fire
item.description: An official said the sparklers were attached to bottles of champagne held too close to the ceiling. Forty people died and more than 100 were injured. ...

item.title: Sparklers Probably Caused Deadly Fire at Swiss Ski Resort, Officials Say
item.description: The bar in the Swiss Alps where the blaze occurred was popular with people in their late teens and early 20s. Friends and families have been mounting ...

item.title: Ukraine’s Zelensky Names Kyrylo Budanov as New Chief of Staff
item.description: Kyrylo Budanov, who has served as Ukraine’s military intelligence chief, is seen as a potential rival to Mr. Zelensky if elections are held.
